channel.title: Click levelup
channel.description:
Hello... Just want to get right in depth.
Source: Codeusa Version: z508/525 cache
Also I am fairly talented with java. But anything i try doesn't seem to work.
I want it so that when you click on the attack level in the skills tab it levels you up one... or it opens a box and you type in what level you want in it.
I already have this(lol it ain't anything, just like a shell)
in actionbuttons.java
[code]Case 320: if (buttonid == 125) { } break;[/code]
I have tried ways, but they don't work, please help.

item.title: Click levelup
item.dc:creator: @abdullah abdullah
item.description:
@abdullah wrote:

the switch statement is handling interface id
320 is the interface id for skill tab
125 is the button id for attack thingy

EDIT:
i created a method in player and called on it in action buttons… problem solved… thanks everyone

Read full topic

item.title: Click levelup
item.dc:creator: @abdullah abdullah
item.description:
@abdullah wrote:

yeah… thanks for your help but if i did something like that i would have to make it

if (p.getlevelforxp(0) == 1) {
addSkillXP(83, 0)
} else if (p.getlevelforxp(0) == 2) {
and so on…

but you know that might work if i make a method for it and make yourself have to input a int for the skill id

Read full topic

item.title: Click levelup
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

you mighthave to edit this to make it a 508 but, try:

addSkillXP(200000000, 2)

that won’t work but that might help.

Read full topic
